verses.name: 1 Kings 7:41
verses.text: The two pillars, and the two bowls of the chapiters that were on the top of the two pillars; and the two networks, to cover the two bowls of the chapiters which were upon the top of the pillars;

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:42
verses.text: And four hundred pomegranates for the two networks, even two rows of pomegranates for one network, to cover the two bowls of the chapiters that were upon the pillars;

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:43
verses.text: And the ten bases, and ten lavers on the bases;

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:44
verses.text: And one sea, and twelve oxen under the sea;
